qas.question: How many of New York's boroughs would be counted among the United States' ten most populated cities if they were independent?
How many boroughs does New York City have?
Which four boroughs of NYC would be among the the most populous cities in the US if they were independent cities?

answers.text: Brooklyn, Queens, Manhattan, and the Bronx

context: There are hundreds of distinct neighborhoods throughout the <a1_0>five<a1_0/> boroughs of New York City, many with a definable history and character to call their own. If the boroughs were each independent cities, <a0_0>four<a0_0/> of the boroughs (<a2_0>Brooklyn, Queens, Manhattan, and the Bronx<a2_0/>) would be among the ten most populous cities in the United States.
